content.question: Which of the following civil rights groups is NOT correctly matched with one of its leading figures?

choices.label: Southern Christian Leadership Conference . . Marcus Garvey
National Association for the Advancement of Colored People . . Roy Wilkins
Student Nonviolent Coordinating Committee . . Stokely Carmichael

content.answer: Southern Christian Leadership Conference . . Marcus Garvey

topic.text: 8.10: The African American Civil Rights Movement (1960s)

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
